blogPost.title: What are the steps for building and scaling a company? Answer by Jack Simms, Co-founder and COO @homevaletco. https://t.co/3VPGHylw9x https://t.co/0OxmmDkITs
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 建立和扩大公司规模的步骤是什么？由联合创始人兼首席运营官Jack Simms@homevaletco回答。https://t.co/3VPGHylw9x https://t.co/0OxmmDkITs。
建立和擴大公司規模的步驟是什麼？由聯合創始人兼首席運營官Jack Simms@homevaletco回答。https://t.co/3VPGHylw9x https://t.co/0OxmmDkITs。

previous.title: What are the top most desirable skills by employers for engineers? Answer by Hector Aguilar, President of Technology @okta. https://t.co/kVgBl02xcu https://t.co/EmT3HEjASZ

localize.full_text: 雇主对工程师最需要的技能是什么？回答者：Hector Aguilar，技术总裁@okta。https://t.co/kVgBl02xcu。
僱主對工程師最需要的技能是什麼？回答者：Hector Aguilar，技術總裁@okta。https://t.co/kVgBl02xcu。

next.title: What are the most important career lessons you've learned as a woman in the business world? Answer by @1stladyofcolors, Co-founder of OPI & Author of I'm Not Really A Waitress. https://t.co/TEDONc98Kz https://t.co/DCfH3yE9pj

localize.full_text: 作为商界女性，你学到的最重要的职业经验是什么？回答者：@1stladyofcolors，OPI联合创始人&amp；《我不是真正的服务员》作者。https://t.co/DCfH3yE9pj。
作爲商界女性，你學到的最重要的職業經驗是什麼？回答者：@1stladyofcolors，OPI聯合創始人&amp；《我不是真正的服務員》作者。https://t.co/DCfH3yE9pj。
